summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Bagley Avenue from the North 4th Street to a point one hundred seventy-eight (178) feet north of the north line of No. 46" street et al in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete walks under Ordinance No. 19545, creating Local Improvement District No. 1877 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
